---
title: |
  Microbiome Data Visualization
subtitle: |
  A structured guide to composition, diversity, ordination, and interpretation

knit: bookdown::render_book
site: bookdown::bookdown_site
documentclass: book
classoption: openany

description: |
  Microbiome Data Visualization is a practical, interpretation-focused guide built on a single
  canonical dataset (QIIME2 Moving Pictures). It explains how microbiome plots are constructed,
  what they represent, and how to interpret them carefully using reproducible R workflows.

github-repo: "https://github.com/tmbuza/microbiome-data-visualization/"
favicon: "favicon.ico"

# Styling
fontsize: 12pt
spacing: double
mainfont: Times New Roman
colorlinks: yes
fig_caption: yes
indent: no
geometry: margin=1in
always_allow_html: yes

# Bibliography (optional for now)
# bibliography:
#   - library/references.bib
# csl:
#   - library/apa.csl
# link-citations: yes

# Extra pandoc args
pandoc_args: ["--variable=linestretch:2"]

# Extra CSS
css:
  - style.css
---
